original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Meṇḍakapañha
analyzed: meṇḍakapañha

original: Sabbaññutañāṇavagga
analyzed: sabbaññuta ñāṇa vagga

original: 8. Amarādevīpañha
“Bhante nāgasena, bhāsitampetaṁ bhagavatā—
analyzed: bhante nāgasena bhāsitam petam bhagavatā

original: ‘Sace labhetha khaṇaṁ vā raho vā,
analyzed: sace labhetha khaṇam vā rahaḥ vā

original: Nimantakaṁ vāpi labhetha tādisaṁ;
analyzed: nimantakam vā api labhetha tādisa

original: Sabbāva itthī kayiruṁ nu pāpaṁ,
analyzed: itthī kayirum nu pāpa

original: Aññaṁ aladdhā pīṭhasappinā saddhin’ti.
analyzed: aññam a laddhā pīṭhasappinā saddhinti

original: Puna ca kathīyati ‘mahosadhassa bhariyā amarā nāma itthī gāmake ṭhapitā pavutthapatikā raho nisinnā vivittā rājappaṭisamaṁ sāmikaṁ karitvā sahassena nimantīyamānā pāpaṁ nākāsī’ti.
analyzed: puna ca kathīyati mahosadhassa bhariyā amarā nāma itthī gāmake ṭhapitā pavuttha patikā rahaḥ nisinnā vivittā rāja ppaṭisamam sāmikam karitvā sahassena nimantīyamānā pāpam na akāsi iti

original: Yadi, bhante nāgasena, bhagavatā bhaṇitaṁ—
analyzed: yadi bhante nāgasena bhagavatā bhaṇita

original: ‘sace …pe…
analyzed: sace pe

original: saddhin’ti tena hi ‘mahosadhassa bhariyā …pe…
analyzed: saddhinti tena hi mahosadhassa bhariyā pe

original: nākāsī’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā.
analyzed: na akāsi iti yam tam micchā

original: Yadi mahosadhassa bhariyā …pe…
analyzed: yadi mahosadhassa bhariyā pe

original: nākāsi, tena hi ‘sace …pe…
analyzed: nākāsi tena hi sace

original: saddhin’ti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
analyzed: vacanam micchā

original: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
analyzed: ayam pi ubhatas koṭikaḥ pañho tava anuppatto saḥ tayā nibbāhitabbaḥ ti

original: “Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā—
analyzed: mahā rāja bhagavatā

original: ‘sace …pe…
analyzed: sace pe

original: saddhin’ti.
analyzed: sat hinti

original: Kathīyati ca ‘mahosadhassa bhariyā …pe…
analyzed: kathīyati ca mahosadhassa bhariyā pe

original: nākāsī’ti.
analyzed: nākā asi iti

original: Kareyya sā, mahārāja, itthī sahassaṁ labhamānā tādisena purisena saddhiṁ pāpakammaṁ,
analyzed: kareyya sā mahā rāja itthī sahassam labhamānā tādisena purisena saddhim pāpa kamma

original: na sā kareyya sace khaṇaṁ vā raho vā nimantakaṁ vāpi tādisaṁ labheyya, vicinantī
analyzed: na sā kareyya sace khaṇam vā rahaḥ vā nimantakam vā api tādisam labheyya vicinantī

original: sā, mahārāja, amarā itthī na addasa khaṇaṁ vā raho vā nimantakaṁ vāpi tādisaṁ.
analyzed: sā mahā rāja amarā itthī na addasa khaṇam vā rahaḥ vā nimantakam vā api tādisa

original: Idha loke garahabhayā khaṇaṁ na passi, paraloke nirayabhayā khaṇaṁ na passi, kaṭukavipākaṁ
analyzed: idha loke garaha bhayā khaṇam na passi para loke niraya bhayā khaṇam na passi kaṭuka vipāka

original: pāpanti khaṇaṁ na passi, piyaṁ amuñcitukāmā khaṇaṁ na passi, sāmikassa garukatāya
analyzed: pāpanti khaṇam na passi piyam a muñcitu kāmā khaṇam na passi sāmikassa garuka tāya

original: khaṇaṁ na passi, dhammaṁ apacāyantī khaṇaṁ na passi, anariyaṁ garahantī khaṇaṁ na
analyzed: khaṇam na passi dhammam apacāyantī khaṇam na passi anariyam garahantī khaṇam na

original: passi, kiriyaṁ abhinditukāmā khaṇaṁ na passi.
analyzed: passi kiriyam a bhinditu kāmā khaṇam na passi

original: Evarūpehi bahūhi kāraṇehi khaṇaṁ na passi.
analyzed: evarūpehi bahūhi kāraṇehi khaṇam na passi

original: Rahopi sā loke vicinitvā apassantī pāpaṁ nākāsi.
analyzed: rahaḥ pi sā loke vicinitvā a passantī pāpam

original: Sace sā manussehi raho labheyya, atha amanussehi raho na labheyya.
analyzed: sace sā manussehi rahaḥ labheyya atha amanussehi rahaḥ na labheyya

original: Sace amanussehi raho labheyya, atha paracittavidūhi pabbajitehi raho na labheyya.
analyzed: sace amanussehi rahaḥ labheyya atha para citta vidūhi pabbajitehi rahaḥ na labheyya

original: Sace paracittavidūhi pabbajitehi raho labheyya, atha paracittavidūnīhi devatāhi raho na labheyya.
analyzed: sace para citta vidūhi pabbajitehi rahaḥ labheyya atha para citta vidūnīhi devatāhi rahaḥ na labheyya

original: Sace paracittavidūnīhi devatāhi raho labheyya, attanāva pāpehi raho na labheyya.
analyzed: sace para citta vidūnīhi devatāhi rahaḥ labheyya pāpehi rahaḥ na labheyya

original: Sace attanāva pāpehi raho labheyya, atha adhammena raho na labheyya.
analyzed: sace attanāva pāpehi rahaḥ labheyya atha adhammena rahaḥ na labheyya

original: Evarūpehi bahuvidhehi kāraṇehi raho alabhitvā pāpaṁ nākāsi.
analyzed: evarūpehi bahuvidhehi kāraṇehi rahaḥ a labhitvā pāpam

original: Nimantakampi sā loke vicinitvā tādisaṁ alabhantī pāpaṁ nākāsi.
analyzed: sā loke vicinitvā tādisam a labhantī pāpam

original: Mahosadho, mahārāja, paṇḍito aṭṭhavīsatiyā aṅgehi samannāgato.
analyzed: mahosadhaḥ mahā rāja paṇḍitaḥ aṭṭhavīsatiyā aṅgehi samannāgato

original: Katamehi aṭṭhavīsatiyā aṅgehi samannāgato?
analyzed: katamehi aṭṭhavīsatiyā aṅgehi samannāgataḥ

original: Mahosadho, mahārāja, sūro hirimā ottappī sapakkho mittasampanno khamo sīlavā saccavādī
analyzed: mahosadhaḥ mahā rāja sūraḥ hirimā ottappī sapakkhaḥ mitta sampannaḥ khamaḥ sīlavā sacca vādī

original: soceyyasampanno akkodhano anatimānī anusūyako vīriyavā āyūhako saṅgāhako saṁvibhāgī
analyzed: soceyya sampannaḥ akkodhanaḥ an atimānī an usūyakaḥ vīriyavā āyūhakaḥ saṅgāhakaḥ savibhāgī

original: sakhilo nivātavutti saṇho asaṭho amāyāvī atibuddhisampanno kittimā vijjāsampanno
analyzed: sa khilaḥ nivāta vutti saṇhaḥ asaṭhaḥ a māyāvī ati buddhi sampanno kittimā vijjā sampanno

original: hitesī upanissitānaṁ patthito sabbajanassa dhanavā yasavā.
analyzed: hita īsī upanissitānam patthitaḥ sabba janassa dhanavā yasavā

original: Mahosadho, mahārāja, paṇḍito imehi aṭṭhavīsatiyā aṅgehi samannāgato.
analyzed: mahosadhaḥ mahā rāja paṇḍitaḥ imehi aṭṭhavīsatiyā aṅgehi samannāgataḥ

original: Sā aññaṁ tādisaṁ nimantakaṁ alabhitvā pāpaṁ nākāsī”ti.
analyzed: sā aññam tādisam nimantakam a labhitvā pāpam na akāsi iti

original: “Sādhu, bhante nāgasena, evametaṁ tathā sampaṭicchāmī”ti.
analyzed: sādhu bhante nāgasena evam etam tathā sampaṭicchāmi iti

original: Amarādevīpañho aṭṭhamo.
analyzed: amarādevīpañhaḥ aṭṭhamo
